name: Walkies (TheStug)
description:
WALKIES - Elaine has taken up a new job in the city, working late. Where once she could walk her beloved pet on a brisk afternoon, Now she must take him out in the dead of night. All is not still in this park. A maniac is on the loose and he has Elaine on his mind.

Warning game does contain mature content. (Violence/Implied Alcohol usage)

  • Unique dog centered game-play - losing your dog could cost you your life
  • Strange characters - they say only the freaks come out at night
  • Explore a park based off real locations but be home before midnight
  • Retro 3D Graphical look
  • Creepy ambience
  • 2 Endings
  • Hidden Easter Egg
YOUR NEXT STEP COULD BE YOUR LAST

RELEASE 30/10/2022

CONTROLS

WASD - Move
Shift - Sprint
Space - Interact/Call Dog
F - Flashlight Toggle
T - Check Watch
Enter - confirm dialogue
